newsitem.title: USA: United Paramount chairwoman to leave - Variety.
newsitem.headline: United Paramount chairwoman to leave - Variety.

text.p: United Paramount Network chairwoman and chief executive Lucie Salhany has decided not to renew her contract this fall after an embattled three years at the helm, Daily Variety said on Thursday.
Salhany would remain in her post until a replacement was found and would be involved in setting its fall schedule, the report said.
Salhany planned to move to Boston and launch her own advisory company called J.H. Media Ltd, Variety said, and would remain on the UPN operating committee.
Viacom's Paramount and Chris-Craft Industries launched UPN in January 1995.
